required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Snuff and/or Red Wine om Metabolic Rate
clinical_study.official_title: Metabolic Effects of Snuff and Red Wine

brief_summary.textblock: About 14 healthy participants, consume a standardized breakfast combined with either using regular or nicotine-free moist snuff. The metabolic rate is measured every hour for four hours on each occasion starting in the morning. Participants are also randomized to get red wine or non-alcoholic red wine to the meal.

detailed_description.textblock: About 14 healthy participants, consume a standardized breakfast combined with either using regular or nicotine-free moist snuff. The metabolic rate is measured measured before the meal and then every hour for a total of four hours on each occasion that starts in the morning. Participants are also randomized to get red wine or non-alcoholic red wine to the meal. Since there are four possible combinations of the wine and the snuff, all participants do the test on four occasions. Except for metabolic rate we will also analyze hormone responses regarding appetite or hunger.

study_design_info.masking_description: We use non-alcoholic or alcohol containing wine and regular or nicotine free snuff

primary_outcome.description: Measurement of metabolic rate by registration of CO2 in breath and the oxygen uptake

secondary_outcome.description: determination of the hormones ghrelin and GLP-1 in serum

arm_group.description: regular red wine and moist snuff
regular red wine and nicotine-free snuff

arm_group.arm_group_label: non alcoholic red wine and regular moist snuff
arm_group.description: non alcoholic red wine and regular moist snuff with nicotine

arm_group.arm_group_label: non-alcoholic red wine and nicotine-free snuff
arm_group.description: Non-alcoholic red wine and nicotine-free snuff

intervention.intervention_name: Wine with or without alcohol and snuff with or without nicotine
intervention.description: Two by two factorial of wine and snuff with meals
intervention.arm_group_label: non alcoholic red wine and regular moist snuff
non-alcoholic red wine and nicotine-free snuff

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria: No significant disease -
Exclusion Criteria: known illnesses, thyroid disease, need to take prednisolone, psychiatric disease,inability to understand Swedish
-
